channel.title: Projects on Roboticist
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Roboticist

item.title: Reconfigurable Quadrupedal-Bipedal Snake Robots (ReQuBiS)
item.description: A re-configurable robot which can transition into biped, quadruped and snake configurations without any re-arrangement of modules.

item.title: Sahayak
item.description: A teleoperated differential-drive robot to deliver food packets and medicines to the COVID patients. Doctors can interact with patients from a safe distance using the onboard video conferencing system.

item.title: Multi Agent Wireless Sensor Network
item.description: Implemented a mesh network based on IEEE 802.15.4 to establish consensus in a swarm of robots. Established handshake using Atmega328p as well as TIVA TM4C123GXL launchpad.

item.title: Harmonic Motion Analyser
item.description: MATLAB based program to analyze motion equation and parameters. I Designed an algorithm for tracing path of a damped oscillator.

item.title: Hobby Projects
item.description: I enjoy taking up small handy projects like Line follower bot, Designed a manually controlled mobile robot, Fabricated a clap switch, Fabricated a cell phone charger.

item.title: Laser Security System
item.description: Implemented a laser security system with push notifications capability and real-time monitoring.
